preface.title: Foreword: ${project.version}
preface.para: This is an initial pre-alpha version of the Maven Cookbook, and I mean "pre-alpha". If you are coming to the book with the expectation that this is a polished product, please check back in a few months, we're going to be developing this content over the next few months, and you should expect at least two chapters a month for the next five or six. I'm convinced that this will be a better book because people are going to have a window into the process, you will be able to see the false starts, outline revisions, and other parts of the writing process that are usually hidden from view. You'll be able to give us feedback and reviews even before we've stated that the content is ready for review.
